title.rendered: Global Centrifugal Pumps Market is expected to be worth US$ 60 Billion at a CAGR of 6.2% by the forecast period 2033 end

content.rendered:
With commercial & residential infrastructure at its peak, the global centrifugal pump market is expected to grow graciously in the forecast period. Europe holds a sizable market share on the back of the growing deployment of space cooling and heating systems along with setting up new power plants in the UK, France, Russia, Germany, and Italy.

/EIN News/ — NEWARK, Del, June 02, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — The centrifugal pumps market is predicted to be valued at US$ 33 billion in 2023 and US$ 60 billion by 2033. Over the projection period, sales in the Centrifugal Pumps market are expected to increase at a CAGR of 6.2%. Significant growth opportunities lie in the growing demand for energy-efficient pumps. As sustainability becomes a top priority across industries, manufacturers are developing centrifugal pumps that minimize energy consumption without compromising performance.

An emerging trend is the integration of digitalization and IoT capabilities in centrifugal pumps. Smart pumps equipped with sensors and connectivity features offer real-time monitoring, predictive maintenance, and remote control capabilities. This not only enhances operational efficiency but also reduces downtime and maintenance costs.

Get an overview of the market from industry experts to evaluate and develop growth strategies. Get your sample report here @ 
https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/reports/sample/rep-gb-498

The rising emphasis on water conservation and wastewater treatment presents untapped opportunities for centrifugal pump manufacturers. With increasing environmental regulations and the need for efficient water management, there is a growing demand for pumps specifically designed for water treatment processes. The market is witnessing a shift towards customization and modular design. Manufacturers are providing centrifugal pumps that can be easily tailored to meet specific requirements, enabling better adaptability across diverse applications.

Key Takeaways:

  • The Canadian centrifugal pumps market is projected to experience a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of approximately 4% during the forecast period.
  • Germany holds around 18% of the market share in Europe as of 2023.
  • Sales in the GCC countries are expected to contribute to over 44% of the centrifugal pumps market in the Middle East and Africa in 2023.
  • China is predicted to exhibit a CAGR of over 6% in the next decade.
  • The industrial sector dominates the market, representing nearly 60% of the total market share in 2023.
  • By 2033, the multi-stage pump segment is estimated to account for over 55% of the market.

How Key Players are revolutionizing this market?

Key players in the centrifugal pump market are revolutionizing manufacturing through various strategies and innovations. They are investing in research and development to enhance pump efficiency, durability, and performance. Advanced materials like composites and alloys are being used to improve pump components, reducing maintenance and operating costs.

Players are incorporating smart technologies such as IoT and AI to enable remote monitoring, predictive maintenance, and energy optimization. Automation and robotics are streamlining the production process, improving productivity and reducing human errors. There is a growing emphasis on sustainable manufacturing practices, including the use of eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient processes, reducing environmental impact. Overall, these advancements are driving the evolution of the centrifugal pumps market and providing improved solutions for various industries.

Grow your profit margins – Buy this report now at a discounted price @ https://www.futuremarketinsights.com/checkout/498

Competitive Landscape:

Ebara Corporation, Xylem Inc., Sulzer AG, Flowserve Corporation, Grundfos, Wier Group, KSB Group, Shakti Pump, Kirloskar Brothers Ltd.,WILO SE, Tsurumi Manufacturing Co., Ltd., DESMI A/S, WPIL Limited, HERMETIC-Pumpen GmbH, Klaus Union GmbH & Co. KG , Ruhrpumpen Group, HOMA Pumpenfabrik GmbH, CP Pumpen AG, Toyo Denki Industrial Co. Ltd., Speck Pumpen Walter Speck GmbH & Co. KG.

Product Portfolio:

  • Ebara Corporation offers a diverse product portfolio including pumps, compressors, turbines, and environmental equipment, catering to various industries such as water supply, wastewater treatment, and energy.
  • Xylem Inc. specializes in providing innovative water solutions, offering a wide range of products such as pumps, filters, and treatment systems, aimed at addressing water challenges faced by communities, industries, and commercial sectors.

More Valuable Insights Available:

Future Market Insights offers an unbiased analysis of the centrifugal pumps market, providing historical data from 2018 to 2022 and forecast statistics from 2023 to 2033.

To understand opportunities in the centrifugal pumps market, the report is segmented on the basis of product type (single-stage pump, multi-stage pump, axial & mixed flow pump, submersible pump, and sealless & circular pump), and application type (industrial centrifugal pumps, agricultural centrifugal pumps and domestic centrifugal pumps), across five major regions (North America, Latin America, Europe, Asia Pacific, and Middle East & Africa). 

Key Segments Profiled:

By Product Type:

  • Single Stage Pump
  • Multi-Stage Pump
  • Axial & Mixed Flow Pump
  • Submersible Pump
  • Seal Less & Circular Pump

By Application Type:

  • Industrial Centrifugal Pumps
    • Oil & Gas
    • Chemical
    • Water & Wastewater
    • Food & Beverage
    • Pharmaceutical
    • Power
    • Others
  • Agricultural Centrifugal Pumps
  • Domestic Centrifugal Pumps

By Region:

  • North America
  • Latin America
  • Europe
  • Asia Pacific
  • Middle East and Africa

Explore FMI’s Extensive Coverage in Industrial Automation Domain:

Below 30 Hp Centrifugal Water Pump Market Size: The below 30 Hp centrifugal water pump market is anticipated to increase, from US$ 37.1 million in 2022 to US$ 68.95 million in 2032. 

Heat Pumps Market Share: The heat pumps market to grow with a year-on-year growth of 3.6% in 2022 reaching a value of about US$ 33,156 Million by 2022 end. By 2032.

Power Quality Equipment Market Review: The power quality equipment market size is estimated to be worth US$ 38.04 billion in 2023 and is projected to reach US$ 69.65 billion by 2033.

Power-to-X Market Forecast: The Power-to-X market is likely to thrive at a CAGR of 9.8% during the forecast period (2023 to 2033). The market is anticipated to cross a market share of US$ 484 million by 2033 while it holds a value of US$ 190 million in 2023.

Building Automation Systems Market Overview: The building automation systems market size is projected to be valued at US$ 52.2 Billion in 2023 and is expected to rise to US$ 103.4 Billion by 2033. 

Diamond Core Drilling Market Outlook: The global diamond core drilling market is holding a valuation of US$ 2 Billion as of 2023. The market is expected to grow at a CAGR of 6.3% from 2023 to 2033, and the market is expected to reach US$ 3.7 Billion by 2033.

Expansion Valves Market Sales: Sales in the expansion valves market are projected to total US$ 17.4 Billion in 2033 from US$ 11.5 Billion in 2023. Increasing demand for advanced air conditioning systems for installation in diverse sectors will drive growth in the market by 4.2% CAGR between 2023 and 2033.

Pre-Insulated Pipe Market Key trends: The global pre-insulated pipe market size is expected to reach a valuation of US$ 10.6 Billion by 2033

Plucker Machine Market Demand: The plucker machine market has a worth of US$ 1,593 million in 2023 and is projected to reach US$ 2,474 million by 2033, with a CAGR of 4.5% during the forecast period.

Bitumen Sprayer Market Analysis: The global bitumen sprayer market is set to enjoy a valuation of US$ 878.7 Million in 2022, and further grow at a CAGR of 4.0% during the forecast period of 2022 to 2032.
